bug.author: clplaneguy
bug.summary: OpenCV 3.4.0 build does not seem to include HighGui.
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h5>Detailed description</denchmark-h>
I am trying to run the sample program "Smoothing Images" in java. But get an error on HighGui. HighGui seems to be in the source code but not in the build. I will have to compile my own build.
